nodes.text: A courier working with a crime syndicate on the Bothan homeworld of Bothawui became enveloped in a case of mistaken identity when a group of Alliance Intelligence operatives arrived on the planet, one of whom coincidentally happened to have an identical physical appearance. The courier was in possession of a briefcase, the contents of which competing criminal groups were willing to kill for, a fate that befell the courier's Rodian partner. Ultimately, the courier was apprehended by local Bothan police.

The adventure leaves open the courier's sex and species, contingent on the Rebel player who serves as the courier lookalike. Additionally, following the courier's apprehension, the adventure offers a possible scenario for continuing the events, suggesting that the courier may have actually been an undercover agent for a megacorporation who was performing a sting operation that went awry.
